title: Statement from the President on the American Medical Association's Support for H.R. 3200 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 16, 2009

 



Statement from the President on the American Medical Association's Support for H.R. 3200




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  _________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                         July 16, 2009  Statement from the President on the American Medical Association’s Support for H.R. 3200  "I am grateful that the doctors of the AMA have chosen to support health insurance reform that will lower costs, expand coverage, and assure choice and quality health care for all Americans. Along with the nation’s nurses, these doctors are joining the chorus of Americans who know that the time to reform what is broken about our health care system is now." THE WHITE HOUSE, July 16, 2009.
